items.title: Sweet Potato & Lentil Soup (Iftar)
items.ingredients:
2 large sweet potatoes, diced
1 cup red lentils
1 onion, chopped
3 cloves garlic
1 tsp cumin
1 tsp turmeric
4 cups vegetable broth
Salt & pepper to taste
Fresh cilantro for garnish
items.instructions:
1. Sauté onion and garlic until fragrant
2. Add spices, cook 1 min
3. Add sweet potatoes, lentils, and broth
4. Simmer 30-35 mins until tender
5. Blend until smooth
6. Season and serve with cilantro

items.title: Reza's Restaurant
items.summary: Upscale Persian spot with excellent kabobs and fresh bread. Great for business dinners.
